markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Gibtas Spawn Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1046)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

When a gibtas gorges itself on an incredible amount of flesh, it vomits up a pool of acid filled with tiny pink egg sacs that burst immediately. The new babies hunt as a pack, growing in size until they go their separate ways or consume each other.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Aberration](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11)): DC 24

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Gibtas Spawn Swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1046)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Aberration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=1" />
<trait label="Swarm" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=239" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil](/Sources.aspx?ID=75) pg. 80</row>

**Perception** +14; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -4

**Dex** +5

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 70

**Immunities**
acid, precision, [swarm mind](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=36)

**Resistances**
bludgeoning 9, piercing 5, slashing 5

**Weaknesses**
area damage 5, [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage 5

**Bounce** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature that the gibtas spawn swarm can see targets the swarm with an attack; **Effect** The swarm bounces to the side and gains a +2  circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. After the attack, the swarm can Stride up to its Speed in a straight line as part of the reaction.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Bounding Swarm**   The gibtas spawn swarm moves in loping bounces. The swarm ignores difficult terrain.

**Swarming Bites** <actions string="Single Action" />  Each enemy in the swarm's space takes 2d8 piercing damage and 1d6 acid damage (DC 22 basic Reflex save). A creature that fails its save against Swarming Bites also takes 1d4 [persistent acid damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-213" />
name: Gibtas Spawn Swarm
